subject: Baseball
Appointments and Executive Changes
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: At one time, it appeared that Bud Selig’s successor would be his trusted deputy, Rob Manfred, but some owners balked, giving rise to two other candidates: Tom Werner and Tim Brosnan.
snippet: At one time, it appeared that Bud Selig’s successor would be his trusted deputy, Rob Manfred, but some owners balked, giving rise to two other candidates: Tom Werner and Tim Brosnan.
